name: 林家薇
objective:
本課程為學年課程的第二部分，旨在加強學生在科技背景下的英語能力，側重技術領域的真實場景應用。 學生應在各種科技情境及環境中應用基本的英語語言技能、詞彙、結構和科技英語風格。
This is the second part of the one-year course, aiming to strengthen students’ English competence in the context of technology, highlighting the real-world scenarios in the field of technology. Students are expected to apply basic English language skills, vocabulary, structures and styles of technology English in a variety of technology contexts.
